TopicTitle: The Interplanetary 2A, the next generation of exploration cruiser.

Articles.Content:
BEHOLD, My next generation of Interplanetary Explorer Cruiser, the Interplanetary 2A

After much time, research, effort and will, My space program has moved to the next level, to faster than light propulsion!!!

What took it's older brothers months to journey, now takes only a few hours to this new wondrous craft.

Again I say behold.

All melodrama aside, for those of you who know me and have seen my previous exploration cruisers, I must admit this is a bold leap forward in the technology.

My old Interplanetary 1A through 1D, relied on fusion engines, that while very efficient, the craft still had to take months/years to get anywhere because it still had to travel through normal space.

Starting with the 2A series, I have graduated to warp drive and antimatter reactors.

And I admit, it was a bit of an effort to get her in orbit and fueled from the space station in orbit.

Those pics make me wanna check out more mods! Looks really nice

Those pics make me wanna check out more mods! Looks really nice

yeah, when i find a mod that has great utility to it, I try to integrate it into my existing infrastructure, but the major players are DSM(Deep Space Mission Pack), Impossible Innovations, Kethane, Kerbal Attachment System, KSP Intersteller, Lazor's laser system (Specifically the robotic arms, docking camera and swivel cam.) and H.O.M.E.
